column1: Earth-bread was an edible root known only to the Dwarves.  It was white and fleshy and after boiling was good to eat and similar to bread.  Its name in the Khuzdul is unknown.
When Túrin and his Gaurwaith encountered Mîm and his sons
column2: the Petty-dwarves were carrying sacks of the plants.
column5: Mîm contributed his earth-bread to the food supply of the outlaws
column6: although he refused to share with Ulrad
